ticket.title: Passing cookies from controller to test seems to be broken
ticket.original-body: I've noticed on the apps that I've been upgrading to Rails 3 that use restful_authentication that passing the `auth_token` cookie back to the tests does not work (specifically in the "remember me" related tests). If I inspect the cookies in the controller, it's actually set, but in the test, it shows the key as being set, but the value is nil.
